name: kill-the-newsletter
description: Kill the Newsletter is a tiny web app that turns email newsletters into Atom feeds. Users create unique addresses, subscribe to newsletters with them, then read issues in an RSS reader instead of their inbox.

features.title: Email To Rss
features.description: Convert email newsletters into Atom/RSS feeds automatically. Read newsletters in your RSS reader

features.title: Media Library
features.description: No registration required, start using immediately. Create feeds in seconds

features.title: Atom Feed Output
features.description: Standard Atom feed format compatible with all RSS readers. Use your preferred reading app

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: No tracking, no accounts, minimal data collection. Anonymous newsletter reading

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Minimal resource usage with simple, efficient design. Run on modest hardware
